system.description:
Requirements: You must have mastered one or more classes among Loremaster, Entropist and Angler, and must have learned the Fishing skill.

When you roll a Discovery using Unique-rank bait, you may instead channel to reel in from the cosmos and choose to get any of these special fish:

Astral Leviathan

You may cast an Entropic spell that you know for half the MP required.

Eldritch Elderfish

When you take the Study action during a conflict, you can instead describe two things you want to know, instead of one. You learn both of those things as if you're rolled a 13, learning Detailed information without needing to make a roll (as per the study action open roll chart on page 74 of the Core Rulebook).

Alternatively, you can choose one non-player character in a conflict and learn their physical traits as if you had rolled a 16+ to learn about an NPC's profile (Core Rulebook, page 319).

You also learn all of that creature's Special Rules, if it has any.

Luminescent Voidswimmer

Improve your next fishing die by one (up to d6), and turn a failure into a success. If itâ€™s already a success, turn it into a Discovery. Note that this does not allow you to trigger Call of the Old Ones again.
